description: Different routes for user, instructor and admin Dashboard.
Instructor can add a class or manage his own class.
Users can add a class to there selected class list.
Additionally, users can pay for a chosen class to be enrolled in that class.
Admin can manage users and added classes.
about: A Summer Sports Camp Web Application.

description: This website is a toy action figure online shop.
A seller can add a toy and also can update his added toys.
Users can see all the toys that are added by sellers.
about: A Web Application to sell Toy Action Figures.
